messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Yes, ma'am, could you send the police and an ambulance to Main Street Grill, please?
Where, sir?
Main Street Grill.
Okay, what's going on at the Main Street Grill?
I just came in from taking out my trash and my manager is lying down and there's blood. Please hurry!
Okay, we've got help on the way. Do you know what happened?
No, I just came back inside.
Is he responsive, sir?
I didn't touch him, I didn't go near him. I walked up, saw the blood, and immediately called 9-1-1.
Where in the business is he located?
This is Main Street Grill, right downtown.
I understand, but where exactly inside the business is he? In the kitchen? The bar?
He's inside the bar, near the door going out.
Okay, we've got help on the way. Is there anyone else inside the business with you?
No, ma'am, I'm the only one here.
Okay, sir, listen, calm down. We have help on the way.
I tried to flag someone down outside. What's taking so long?
They've been on the way since you called, sir. What is your name?
My name is <caller name>.
What's the phone number I can reach you at?
I'm staying on the phone until they get here.
I understand, but I need the phone number you're calling from.
Okay, it's <phone number>.
Was the door locked when you left or was it open?
I go out the back door to the restaurant to take out the trash. I just came back inside.
Alright, sir. Help is almost there. Stay with me.
They're here! This way, this way! Come on!
Okay, let them in.
